articles.title: Top Smartphone Launches In July 2025: What’s New And Dropping This Month?
articles.description: From the highly anticipated Nothing Phone (3) to the sleek Vivo X200 FE, here are five smartphones launching in July 2025 that you should watch out for.

articles.title: Vijay Sales announces Open Box Sale: Check offers on smartphones, laptops, smartwatches and more
articles.description: Vijay Sales has announced Open Box sale. As a part of it, the online electronic store is offering deals and discounts on laptops, smartphones and more.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3), Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and other smartphone launches in July 2025
articles.description: Are you waiting for a smartphone upgrade? July 2025 is set to bring exciting launches from top brands like Nothing, Samsung, OPPO and more.

articles.title: Apple releases second iOS 26 Developer Beta: Here's what's new
articles.description: On iOS 26, the Control Center blur effect has been refined, making text and icons easier to read. Safari also sees subtle but welcome interface changes, with tweaks that simplify navigation and button access particularly when working with tabs.

articles.title: Samsung may unveil tri-fold smartphone with Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7 in July event
articles.description: Samsung is reportedly planning to unveil its first tri-fold smartphone alongside new foldables and wearables at its upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9.

articles.title: Warning: Using ChatGPT for these 10 things could put you at serious risk
articles.description: ChatGPT can do a lot, but trusting it too much can put you in danger. From finances to discussing health issues and emergencies, here's what not to use AI for.

articles.title: Realme 15 5G, Realme 15 Pro 5G Confirmed to Launch in India Soon
articles.description: Realme claimed that the 15 series will feature “party-inspired camera features,” including AI-backed imaging that adjusts shutter speed, contrast, and saturation in real time to suit dynamic lighting conditions such as concerts, dance floors, or house parties.

articles.title: Vijay Sales launches Mega Open Box Sale, Know details here
articles.description: Vijay Sales offers big discounts on Open-box and demo models across many popular categories. Check for more information.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 India launch in 1 week: Expected price and specs
articles.description: The OnePlus Nord 5 is set to launch on July 8, which is just 1 week away. We take a look at the leaked price and specs of the upcoming OnePlus phone.

articles.title: Lounge Loves: The return of lip gloss, ‘Traitors’ and more
articles.description: Also featured this week, the comfort of a morning routine and fresh masala mixes created by Kolkata based influencers
